sait.mls.persistence.property

Class ResidentialPropertyBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.mls.persistence.property.ResidentialPropertyBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broker

    public class ResidentialPropertyBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Broker
    An implementation of the Broker interface that regulates the persistence of residential properties
    Version:
    February 4, 2019
    Author:
    Dave Watson, Nick Hamnett

    • Method Detail

      • getBroker

        public static ResidentialPropertyBroker getBroker()
        Method to create an instance of ResidentialPropertyBroker
        Returns:
        ResidentialPropertyBroker

      • persist

        public boolean persist(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to add residential properties to the ArrayList database. If the property's member id is zero then the residential property is assigned the next id in the sequence of id's. If the residential property already exists then the old record is overwritten with the new information.
        Specified by:
        persist in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - - residential property object being added or updated.
        Returns:
        a boolean true if the add or update was successful and false if it was not.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to remove a ResidentialProperty from the data base. The method returns true if ResidentialProperty was removed and false if no ResidentialProperty was removed.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - - the ResidentialProperty that is being removed.
        Returns:
        a boolean to confirm the success or failure of the removal.

      • search

        public java.util.List search(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to search the database for matching items. The search will based on property id, quadrant of city, zoning type, price, number of bedrooms and garage type. The search using price will return any records with a price equal to or greater than the one provided to the search.
        Specified by:
        search in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - - an Object of type ResidentialProperty containing the attribute value of the search item which maybe any of the following: property id, quadrant of city, zoning type, price, number of bedrooms and garage type.
        Returns:
        a List of ResidentialProperty objects matching the search criteria which are passed forward to the GUI front end. The list is originally created by the back end as an ArrayList and returned as a List.

      • closeBroker

        public void closeBroker()
        Method to release resources allocated to the broker and save all modified data. NOTE if this method is not called modified data may be lost
        Specified by:
        closeBroker in interface Broker

      • loadResidentialPropertyLinkedList

        private void loadResidentialPropertyLinkedList()
        Method fills a Singly Linked List as a data structure to store residential property information in a object format. This method is then used to create a serialized file if no serialized file for the residential property currently exists.

      • findHighestCurrentId

        private void findHighestCurrentId()
        Method to search for the last highest id assigned and save it in the class level attribute nextId.

      • loadSerializedFile

        private void loadSerializedFile()
        Method loads the serialized linked list file to propertyList attribute.

      • saveSerializedFile

        private void saveSerializedFile()
        Method saves the propertyList to a serialized linked list file.

      • searchId

        private java.util.List searchId(java.util.ArrayList al,
                                long id)
        Method to search for the property id number and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.
        Parameters:
        al - - ArrayList to contain all properties found.
        id - - search parameter of property id
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all properties found.

      • searchQuadrant

        private java.util.List searchQuadrant(java.util.ArrayList al,
                                      java.lang.String quadrant)
        Method to search for all properties in this quadrant of a city and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.
        Parameters:
        al - - ArrayList to contain all properties found.
        quadrant - - search parameter of quadrant
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all properties found.

      • searchZone

        private java.util.List searchZone(java.util.ArrayList al,
                                  java.lang.String zone)
        Method to search for all properties with this zoning type and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.
        Parameters:
        al - - ArrayList to contain all properties found.
        zone - - search parameter of zoning type
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all properties found.

      • searchAskingPrice

        private java.util.List searchAskingPrice(java.util.ArrayList al,
                                         double price)
        Method to search for all properties with the asking price greater than the search parameter price entered and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.
        Parameters:
        al - - ArrayList to contain all properties found.
        price - - search parameter of asking price
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all properties found.

        Parameters:
        al - - ArrayList to contain all properties found.
